author: dougm
msg: move construct_server method to Apache::URI module
reorder construct_server args to: r, hostname, port, pool
default construct_server args to: hostname = ap_get_server_name(r)

author: dougm
msg: move construct_url method to Apache::URI module
default construct_url args uri=r->uri and pool=r->pool

author: dougm
msg: alias Apache::URI::parse to APR::URI::parse in Apache::compat
